problems.title: Grumpy Bookstore Owner (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Return the maximum number of customers that can be satisfied throughout the day given a secret technique to remain not grumpy for 'minutes' consecutive minutes.

Input Format:
First line: two integers n and minutes.
Second line: n space-separated integers (customers).
Third line: n space-separated integers (grumpy status: 0 or 1).

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the maximum satisfied customers.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
